data.actual_result: It appears as if you're able to ban/kick the webhook and DM it, trying to DM it will result in an empty Group DM, and trying to ban it will bring up the ban modal.
data.expected_result: Either user settings is not there or it does nothing.
data.short_description: You can open user settings on a webhook
data.steps_to_repro: - Long-press on a webhook's message - Select user settings
